title: Comment from Kristen Petros de Guex

analysis.key_quote: This proposal threatens the foundational principles of a professional, merit-based civil service. It weakens job protections that have safeguarded nonpartisan public service for generations, making it easier to dismiss employees without due process.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule by highlighting its potential to undermine civil service protections and promote politicization, which aligns with concerns about merit-based systems and due process rights.
